news.content: For those who missed yesterday's community call (~30 minutes) or would like to rewatch, you can find the recording here!
news.excerpt: For those who missed yesterday's community call (~30 minutes) or would like to rewatch, you can find the recording within!

next.title: Harmony Integrates with ThreeFold’s Decentralized Grid
next.excerpt: Harmony and ThreeFold will work together on developer and user projects on the ThreeFold Grid and Pangaea..
